SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_id, dealer_id, cert_id, cert_number, cert_created_date, record_type, created_date, created_by, rec_cancel, rec_new_business, rec_billing, file_detail_id, 0 as File_Detail_Temp_id FROM elp_daily_outbound_file_detail WHERE file_detail_id = :file_detail_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_daily_outbound_file_detail SET company_id = :company_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, cert_id = :cert_id, cert_number = :cert_number, cert_created_date = :cert_created_date, record_type = :record_type, rec_cancel = :rec_cancel, rec_new_business = :rec_new_business, rec_billing = :rec_billing, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE file_detail_id = :file_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_daily_outbound_file_detail ( file_detail_id, billing_detail_id, company_id, dealer_id, cert_id, cert_number, cert_created_date, rec_cancel, rec_new_business, rec_billing, record_type, created_date, created_by ) VALUES ( :file_detail_id, :billing_detail_id, :company_id, :dealer_id, :cert_id, :cert_number, :cert_created_date, :rec_cancel, :rec_new_business, :rec_billing, :record_type, :created_date, :created_by )
